citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1215-1250 pm
on 30-Aug-17.
Inspector arrived at 1215 pm, knocked at house door with no answer, called phone number on file and left
message, waited for 30 minutes before leaving.
